Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Medical Officer', 3: 'Your name is... Yata?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Medical Officer', 3: 'Yata, your physical parameters are excellent. You meet all the surgical requirements.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Medical Officer', 3: "But there is this thing I'm curious about—why do you want to become a Construct?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Medical Officer', 3: "Don't you want to live as a human? You could die at any time out on the battlefield.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'I want to go back there.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Medical Officer', 3: 'What?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'I want to go back out there to that "battlefield".', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1070.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Guess I've got no choice now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata looks at "Rainbow Breaker" in her hand and lets out a sigh.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'If this blade truly lives up to its legend of cutting down gods, I might still have a sliver of hope.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A sharp crack rings out—and her blade shatters.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Rainbow Breaker... You should be breaking rainbows not getting broken yourself...', 4: '1'}
{3: "With no time to turn and face her attacker, Yata desperately tries to look back... but it's already too late."}
{3: 'At the very last moment...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Masao Osako', 3: 'You sure fought hard back there.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Appearing out of nowhere, Masao blocks the Corrupted's blade with his own sword just as it's about to strike Yata."}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "Hey, Yata, don't lose focus.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Well, look who showed up at the perfect time.', 4: '2'}
{3: "As she speaks, Yata draws Snow's Grace and gives the blade a few test swings."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "How's it going over there?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "We've lost ground. The back entrance has been overrun by the robot army.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "I've ordered my men to fall back. We can't afford to keep losing resources like this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'You should leave, too. What good could you possibly do here?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "Don't forget who just saved your hide. Gee, I'm feeling seriously underestimated here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Great. I was the only one trapped before, and now neither of us can escape.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "Hey, with all this chaos going on, you're telling me the mainland doesn't know about it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Word is a rescue team is on its way, but it'll take time. We just have to hold out until then.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "Got it. I'll take point from here.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory870.jpg'}
{3: 'After a head-on clash with the Corrupted, Yata and Masao finally break through the encirclement.'}
{3: 'Fighting their way back, the two retreat into a hidden storage room.'}
{3: 'As soon as Yata enters, Masao barricades the door with heavy objects.'}
{3: 'After running for so long, Masao is too exhausted to even stand straight.'}
{3: 'Yata carefully leans against the door, listening intently for any movement outside.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Looks like we lost them... Hey, Masao...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As Yata turns around, she finally notices Masao sitting on the ground, exhausted.'}
{3: 'He gasps heavily for air, his school uniform stained crimson with blood around the chest.'}
{3: "Despite Masao's attempts to press down on the wound, the bleeding won't stop."}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: 'Sorry, Yata... They got me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: 'Those robots are damn good at what they do...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With blood trickling from his mouth, Masao manages a smile before his body goes limp.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Hey, Osako, stay with me! The rescue team will be here any minute!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yata frantically searches for bandages, but Masao stops her.'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "It's too late for me... I'm done for, but you still have a chance...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: 'Give those tin cans... what they deserve...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Stay with me, Osako!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: 'Listen to me, Yata.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Masao Osako', 3: "Humanity... won't lose... humanity...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before he can finish his words, Masao falls silent, passing away peacefully.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "No, you can't just... Why here of all places?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata grabs the broken "Rainbow Breaker" and "Snow\'s Grace" and charges forward.'}
{3: 'Within moments, she carves a bloody path through the Corrupted blocking the corridor.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1068.jpg'}
{3: 'Yata reaches the gymnasium and lecture halls, leading the hiding students toward the rooftop.'}
{3: "The rescue team's transport aircraft soon arrives and makes several trips to evacuate the survivors."}
{3: 'As soon as the military personnel arrive for rescue, Yata frantically questions them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Where's Yuka? Have you found her?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Military Officer', 3: 'Yuka?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Yuka Saotome.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Military Officer', 3: "I'm sorry, but I have no information about her. Her name isn't on the list of survivors.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Wait! Can we continue the rescue operation? She must still be in the school!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Military Officer', 3: 'As far as I know, everyone from the school has already been evacuated.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Please, let me go down there! I'll find her myself!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Military Officer', 3: "C'mon, you're not gonna last a second with that body of yours.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Military Officer', 3: "Hold on, there's an incoming transmission.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The man in military uniform turns around to answer his satellite phone.'}
{2: 'Military Officer', 3: 'Yes, the... experimental zone? I... I see.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The man glances at Yata while speaking, then hangs up the phone.'}
{2: 'Military Officer', 3: 'Young lady, I just received word—specifically from a helicopter.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Military Officer', 3: 'About your classmate Yuka, whom you mentioned earlier... During her routine hospital check-up this morning...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Military Officer', 3: 'A bunch of robots went haywire in the building she was in, and she died when the building collapsed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Wait, but... Yuka, she...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Military Officer', 3: 'My condolences.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Having said that, the officer puts on his military cap and takes his leave.'}
{3: "Yata slumps into the transport's temporary seat, despair evident in her vacant stare."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1057.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1057.jpg'}
{3: "Shortly after, Yata receives news that her classmates, who were rehearsing for their graduation ceremony, didn't make it out either."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1052.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1052.jpg'}
{3: 'The situation on Hydrangea Island and Misono High got out of hand, both falling to the Corrupted.'}
{1: 'December. Daylight savings time ends for Misono High.', 3: '60', 4: 'ffffff'}
{3: 'December. Daylight savings time ends for Misono High.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Medical Officer', 3: 'Yata, this "battlefield" you\'re so eager to return to...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Medical Officer', 3: "As far as I'm concerned, it's nothing more than a post-traumatic stress response.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Medical Officer', 3: 'What had happened left its mark on your brain since you were still pretty young when the tragedy took place.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Medical Officer', 3: "Clinging to hatred, even becoming a Construct—none of that will bring back what you've lost.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'But I refuse to live my life as just another survivor!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Somewhere on Earth, there must be people waiting to be saved, just like those children were back then...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I've carried this survivor's guilt for far too long. I can't take it anymore!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Medical Officer', 3: "With this mindset of yours, I'm worried you'll come to regret it someday.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "It's because of my regrets that I chose to become a force against the Punishing.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "And I'm just going to end up living with more regrets... If I don't become stronger.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Medical Officer', 3: 'I understand your desire to fight for redemption, but still...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Medical Officer', 3: 'Then let me ask you one last time, Yata...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Medical Officer', 3: 'Are you willing to become a Construct, to become part of a "weapon"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'No matter how many times you ask, my answer remains the same.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'I am willing, as long as I can keep fighting.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Please, let me become a Construct.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront18.png', 4: '5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront18.png', 4: '5', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1053.jpg'}
{1: '"Like morning dew, this form shall fade; memories drift in dreams of dreams."', 3: '60', 4: 'ffffff'}
{3: '"Like morning dew, this form shall fade; memories drift in dreams of dreams."'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMidAutumnMessageStart.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1072.jpg'}
{3: 'After a long journey through illusions and memories, Yata opens her eyes again to the battlefield.'}
{3: 'She remembers everything now—the cruel past she had deliberately forgotten, only to face it once again.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Guess all I did was go from that illusion into this new dream, huh?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "The force interfering with my M.I.N.D. did weaken for a moment, but it hasn't disappeared.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'I can see things through eyes other than my own...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Yuka, is this what you wanted to tell me?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1066.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1066.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1066.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: '"Come find me at the lecture hall, Yata."', 3: '60', 4: 'ff4e4eff'}
{3: '"Come find me at the lecture hall, Yata."'}
{3: "A brief, sharp pain pierces through Yata's consciousness."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1072.jpg'}
{3: 'She shakes her head to clear away the interference.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "There's no mistake, it's Yuka's voice.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Yuka... It's time we wake up.", 4: '1'}
